brief_title: A Study of KF-0210 in Advanced Solid Tumors Patients
drugs: ['KF-0210 tablets, 120 mg', 'KF-0210 tablets, 240 mg', 'KF-0210 tablets, 450 mg', 'KF-0210 tablets, 600 mg', 'KF-0210 (dosage RP2D-2) + Atezolizumab', 'KF-0210 (dosage RP2D-1) + Atezolizumab', 'KF-0210 (dosage RP2D) + Atezolizumab']
diseases: ['Advanced Solid Tumor', 'Colorectal Cancer', 'Lung Cancer', 'Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Esophagus', 'Gastric Cancer', 'Bladder Cancer']
diseases_list: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Esophagus
brief_summary: The purpose of this Phase I, Multi-Center, Open-Label Study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and anti-tumor activity of KF-0210 in participants with advanced solid tumors. The study will be conducted in two parts: phase Ia, and phase Ib.
